title: Syrian pound
summary: The Syrian pound or Syrian lira (Arabic: الليرة السورية‎, romanized: al-līra as-sūriyya; sign: £S or LS;  code: SYP) is the national currency of Syria and is issued by the Central Bank of Syria. The pound is subdivided into 100 piastres (قرش, plural: قروش, qurūsh in Arabic), although piastre coins are no longer issued. The ISO code for the Syrian pound is SYP.
